name: Grand Vegas Slots Machine - Classic Five Reel
name_original: Grand Vegas Slots Machine - Classic Five Reel
description:
Grand Vegas Slots Machine is a Classic 5-Reel Slots machine where Progressive Jackpots and AWESOME payout is at its best!!!

***** WIN THE BIGGEST JACKPOT OF $1,000,000! AND PLAY THE BEST REALISTIC 5 REEL SLOTS TODAY *****

Grand Vegas Slots Machine Casino invites you to jump in the adventure of the good old classic Las Vegas when slots machine were at its best! Get up to 10 FREE SPINS, get a chance to win the PROGRESSIVE JACKPOT. This classical style slots will make you feel the excitement of Vegas like never before! Grand Vegas Slots Machine is a FAST-PACED 5-reel slots of Vegas! Get caught up in the retro-fueled glow of the lights in this action-packed slots - PLUS, you get FREE CREDITS every 5 minutes!!!

FEATURES of Grand Vegas Slots Machine:

- Beautiful HD graphics - intense and bright!
- Authentic feeling of a classic 5-reel Vegas slots
- HUGE payout with FREE SPINS and PROGRESSIVE JACKPOT!
- FREE CREDITS every 5 MINUTES
- REAL Vegas 777 Slots feeling in the palm of your hand!
- Super fast loading, no hassles, no waiting, no WIFI needed!!
- Free coins on LEVEL UP!


This game is targeted for an adult audience (21+). This game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at this game does not imply future success at "real money gambling".
